ComicInfo.Series: Star Trek: The Mirror War - Sisko
ComicInfo.Summary: The Mirror War: Sisko: Intendant Kira Nerys sends Sisko on a mission to cut off a valuable resource from one of her Cardassian rivals. Sisko finds that he may have to betray a relationship to accomplish his mission.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 15:53:49. [CVDB931010] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:50:58. [Issue ID 2413448]
